entry.title: svn结合apache配置
entry.content:
记录下自己的svn配置，我直接使用的是windows版本的WANDisco SVN，如果是linux的话配置文件是类似的

httpd.conf文件，用于整合apache和svn

<VirtualHost *:80> KeepAlive On <Location /svn> DAV svn SVNParentPath "d:/repositories" AuthzSVNAccessFile d:/repositories/authz AuthType Basic AuthName "Subversion repos" AuthUserFile d:/repositories/passwd Require valid-user </Location> </VirtualHost> passwd文件，存放了每个用户的登录信息

  1. 切换到apache/bin目录下
  2. 执行htpasswd passwd username

authz文件，用于控制权限

[groups]admin = design = dev = cdev = art = [/]@admin = rw[Design:/]* = r@admin = rw@design = rw[Art:/]* = r@admin = rw@design = r@art = rw[Server:/]@admin = rw@dev = rw[Client:/]@admin = rw@dev = rw@cdev = rw
